message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's valued at $12000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $10000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that exceeds your expectations at a competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
